body:
1. Bugfix for android 10 file picker
2. Allowed custom firmware (need to put the startup string in settings)

name: v2.36
body:
1. Few UI enhancements
2. Bug fixes
3. Added option to keep screen on during the job

name: v2.35
body:
1. Separate jog step bar for z-axis
2. Bug fixes #96 #89 #87 #86 #77 #76 #70

1. Ads removed. 
2. Option to view past notifications is added. 
3. "Simple file picker" removed, "Full file picker" now supports both internal and external memory 
4. Bug fix for android 9

Bug Fixes:
1. Go to zero position command not rising Z-Axes if Z is already in zero position of WCO
2. Jog cancel button sometimes not working (addressed this issue to some extent, it may still occur)

New Features:
1. Additional A and B Axis Support (currently there is no way in application to view the position of A and B axis)
2. Wait for buffer runout before sending any EEPROM access command (uses dwell G4P0 to sync the machine and buffer)
3. Inbuilt web view implementation for external help links

1. Serch by gcode file name in file picker.
2. Gcode files are sorted by name.
3. Added optional full file picker where user can browse the phone internal storage to select the gcode file.
4. Added delay for startup commands.
5. Restart application in usb mode if bluetooth adaptor is not found.
6. Firebase notification setup.
Bug fix USB connection is not working in 2.1.5

1. Added Chinese translations (Thanks to "hankso")
 2. Added support for large screens (7inch or above)
1. Correct spelling mistake in the settings panel.

* Improved jog cancel 
* Added haptic feedback for buttons
* Option to rotate XY jog pad functionality

1. Added much waited Usb OTG support (go to setting to change connection type, application must be restarted after changing this).
2. Custom buttons now supports commands upto 1024 chars.
3. Custom commands can be quickly interrupted by pressing Jog cancel button.
4. Fixed few memory leaks.
5. Added more options in settings panel.

name: Release 2.0.0
body:
1. Tool Length Offsets. 
2. Compatible with android oreo. 
3. Fixed few memory leaks and underlying bugs.

name: Release 1.8
body:
#### Changes:
1. UI enhancements and text label changes.
2. Limit pin trigger notification. (corresponding axis will appear in different color in machine position display panel).
3. Accessory state reporting (Spindle, Flood, Mist buttons will reflect their status).
4. Revamped settings page.
5. Fixed bug where service failed to restart if memory is low
